pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchanti bāhuṃ olambentā …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:8.3: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchati bāhuṃ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
